data.content:
noun
plural ~ -trols
[count] :a small device that is used to operate electronic equipment (such as a television) from a distance by using electronic signals
Where did you put the remote control? - called also (informal) remote, (chiefly US, informal) clicker, (Brit, informal) zapper
[noncount] :a process or system that makes it possible to control something from a distance by using electronic signals
The bomb was detonated by remote control.
a DVD player with remote control
a remote control camera

Danh từ
sự điều khiển từ xa
the bomb was exploded by remote control
quả bom được cho nổ bằng điều khiển từ xa
a remote control panel
bảng điều khiển từ xa (máy TV)
